name: penpot
description: Penpot is an open-source design and prototyping platform for product teams. It features real-time collaboration, vector editing, and design systems all within a self-hosted UI that can scale across teams.

features.title: Vector Design Tools
features.description: Professional vector editing with pen tool, shapes, boolean operations, and path manipulation for precise design

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Multiple designers work simultaneously on same file with live cursors and instant synchronization

features.title: Data Export
features.description: Export CSS, inspect measurements, and generate code snippets to streamline designer-developer collaboration

features.title: Version History
features.description: Track design changes over time and restore previous versions when needed for iteration and experimentation

features.title: Team Management
features.description: Organize users into teams with role-based permissions to control access to projects and resources

features.title: Svg Export
features.description: Export designs as clean SVG code with optimization options for web and application use
